overview: It happened in Oxford, Mississippi. It happened in Alabama, Utah, Florida and Tennessee. While the criminals commit crime and the killers kill, your government spends your tax dollars prosecuting adult video. It happened to us. It could happen to you.  Vivid presents On Trial 4: Verdict. This is the final chapter. The jury has reached a verdict in the obscenity case. And it ends just as it began. With a passion.
title: On Trial 4: The Verdict
